-1.title: Feel It
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: The pilot opens with DANNY moving to a new city, unaware of the characters at the workplace. The whole office comes to life. The co-workers just stare at Danny as he heads toward his Office. Danny attempts to interact with his co-workers, but they do not engage with him. After getting hired , Danny starts to see what the workplace really is. His co-workers are nuts, one is a Southern racist and on his left, there is a Black Panther, not to mention a Pushy boss who is convince that he is a girl. Danny tries to ignore the newfound atrocities that his new office and hopes he will survives.
imdb.title: Alter-native Facts
plot: Danny is forced to deal with his neighbors' shenanigans, as his neighbors play race wars. There is no peace for Danny. Even at work, Danny deal with a pushy, macho lesbian boss.::Steven D Crawford II

The pilot opens with DANNY moving to a new city, unaware of the characters at the workplace. The whole office comes to life. The co-workers just stare at Danny as he heads toward his Office. Danny attempts to interact with his co-workers, but they do not engage with him. After getting hired , Danny starts to see what the workplace really is. His co-workers are nuts, one is a Southern racist and on his left, there is a Black Panther, not to mention a Pushy boss who is convince that he is a girl. Danny tries to ignore the newfound atrocities that his new office and hopes he will survives.::Steven D Crawford II
